567.quoteText: All Users that are natural persons must be of full legal age, meaning at least 18 years old (“Adults”). AS A MINOR YOU ARE NOT ENTITLED TO USE FLATTR.
567.title: Age limit of 18

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: Flattr is available only to individuals who are at least 18 years old.

meta.author: Hugo for “Terms of Service; Didn't Read”
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. 678.quoteText:
As our Services evolve, we may change this Privacy Policy from time to time.
The respective current version is available at flattr.com/privacy.
We encourage you to check the Privacy Policy frequently to see if it has changed.
678.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.
